Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here)
Please post any new information, or questions here.
If a topic need to be moved into another section, moderators will do so.
This section covers the NTSC/NA game "Monster Rancher".
The UK/PAL "Monster Rancher" (PAL on the cover) is actually what we call "Monster Rancher 2"
and is extensively covered in the Monster Rancher 2 Archive.
If you are playing the PAL game, that is if you live in Europe, Australia, NZ, etc.,
do not post about it here USE THE MONSTER RANCHER 2 ARCHIVE.
